meanings.definition: Defeated in a game or competition.
meanings.sent1: The team felt beaten after losing the match.
meanings.sent2: The beaten player shook hands with the winner.
meanings.sent3: The beaten team decided to practice harder for the next game.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits were as beaten as the losing team.
meanings.sent5: The image of defeat was etched in their beaten expressions.

meanings.definition: Worn down or shaped by constant use or friction.
meanings.sent1: The beaten path through the forest showed many footprints.
meanings.sent2: The beaten old chair creaked when sat upon.
meanings.sent3: The beaten shoes had walked many miles.
meanings.sent4: Her beaten hands showed years of hard work.
meanings.sent5: The beaten wood of the table was smooth from years of use.

meanings.sent1: She beaten the eggs until they were fluffy.
meanings.sent2: The chef beaten the ingredients together in a bowl.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they beaten the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: The storm beaten the ocean into a frenzy.
meanings.sent5: The music beaten the crowd into a dancing frenzy.
